functionDeclarations.name: get_weather
functionDeclarations.description: Get current weather information for a city

city.description: The name of the city to get weather for

functionDeclarations.name: get_stock_price
functionDeclarations.description: Get current stock price and related information for a given stock symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol to get price information for (e.g., AAPL, GOOGL)

functionDeclarations.name: get_count
functionDeclarations.description: return the current value of the counter
